siteData.title: About Us
siteData.subtitle: Developing software projects and electronical systems in various industries each of us tried to challenge the status quo individually. We improve automatize and develop each step in the products we worked for. During the last 15 years the embedded software products and tools diversify and penetrated all industries, we evolved and improved the skill sets we master together seeking to push further and evolve. Our target is to hit the milestone of reliability and quality through what we do best communication and software.
